channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft SQL Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft SQL Server

item.title: CVE-2018-8273|2024-08-05T06:46:13.807Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20sql%20server
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Microsoft SQL Server that could allow remote code execution on an affected system, aka "Microsoft SQL Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft SQL Server.
